div.div: μῦθος : speech with reference to the subject - matter, like the later λόγος, hence to be paraphrased in Eng. by various more specific words, ‘conversation,’ ‘recital,’ ‘subject,’ ‘request,’ ‘counsel,’ ‘command,’ etc., Od. 4.214, 597, ο 196, Il. 1.545.
From A Homeric Dictionary (Georg Autenrieth, New York, Harper and Brothers, 1891)
